attributes.action: Give parents the right to withdraw their children from LGBT teaching.
attributes.additional_details: So why would a parent not be given the right on such a sensitive subject.
attributes.background: Parents should be allowed to withdraw their children as they may be to young to understand the complications of transgender issues. It may go against their beliefs and could cause understandable confusion for the child. As a parent you can withdraw your child fom Halloween or Christmas activities.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You can find out more about what the Government proposes should be taught in relationships classes and what would be a decision for individual schools here:

https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN06103/SN06103.pdf

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
